Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_OrderWorkflowSetting] WHERE [workflow_kbn] = '999' AND [workflow_no] = '1') BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[w2_OrderWorkflowSetting] ([shop_id] ,[workflow_kbn] ,[workflow_no] ,[workflow_ref_no] ,[workflow_name] ,[display_order] ,[display_count] ,[valid_flg] ,[workflow_detail_kbn] ,[display_kbn] ,[additional_search_flg] ,[search_setting] ,[cassette_no_update] ,'1'
